labels.name: critical
labels.description: Must be fixed ASAP

labels.name: high
labels.description: Stalls work on the project or its dependents

labels.name: medium
labels.description: Not blocking but should be fixed soon

labels.name: low
labels.description: Low priority and doesn't need to be rushed

labels.name: ready for work
labels.description: Ready for work

labels.name: blocked
labels.description: Blocked & therefore, not ready for work

labels.name: ticket work required
labels.description: Needs more details before it can be worked on

labels.name: discarded
labels.description: Will not be worked on

labels.name: awaiting triage
labels.description: Has not been triaged & therefore, not ready for work

labels.name: addition
labels.description: Addition of new feature

labels.name: improvement
labels.description: Improvement to an existing feature

labels.name: fix
labels.description: Bug fix

labels.name: text
labels.description: Concerns the textual material in the repository

labels.name: code
labels.description: Concerns the software code in the repository

labels.name: interface
labels.description: Concerns end-users' experience with the software

labels.name: dx
labels.description: Concerns developers' experience with the codebase

labels.name: question
labels.description: Can be resolved with an answer

labels.name: discussion
labels.description: Open for discussions and feedback

labels.name: good first issue
labels.description: New-contributor friendly

labels.name: help wanted
labels.description: Open to participation from the community

labels.name: staff only
labels.description: Restricted to CC staff members
